mapper.update: update event_inst_item set EVT_INST_ID = #{evtInstId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, EVT_ITEM_ID = #{evtItemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, EVT_ITEM_CODE = #{evtItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVT_ITEM_VALUE = #{evtItemValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where EVT_INST_ITEM_ID = #{evtInstItemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select EVT_INST_ITEM_ID, EVT_INST_ID, EVT_ITEM_ID, EVT_ITEM_CODE, EVT_ITEM_VALUE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from event_inst_item where EVT_INST_ITEM_ID = #{evtInstItemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select EVT_INST_ITEM_ID, EVT_INST_ID, EVT_ITEM_ID, EVT_ITEM_CODE, EVT_ITEM_VALUE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from event_inst_item
